dialogues.speaker: Sophia
dialogues.text: Hello, I am Sophia. Welcome to the library. Can I help you find a book?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Yes, I am looking for a book on the history of the city.

dialogues.speaker: Sophia
dialogues.text: We have several books on that topic. Let me show you.

dialogues.speaker: Sophia
dialogues.text: *Sophia walks the Player to a section of shelves containing books on the history of the city.*

dialogues.speaker: Sophia
dialogues.text: These are some of the books we have on the history of the city.

dialogues.speaker: Sophia
dialogues.text: Is there anything else I can help you with today?

dialogues.speaker: Sophia
dialogues.text: Okay. Please let me know if you need anything else.
